snippet: The Chinese pipa player Wu Man, who has blazed trails as a female performer in a male-dominated tradition, performed at Symphony Space in a concert presented by the World Music Institute.
abstract: Steve Smith reviews performance by Chinese pipa player Wu Man as part of World Music Institute's Global Salon series at Leonard Nimoy Thalia at Symphony Space.
lead_paragraph: The Chinese pipa player Wu Man, who has blazed trails as a female performer in a male-dominated tradition, performed at Symphony Space in a concert presented by the World Music Institute.

headline.seo: Wu Man, via World Music Institute, at Symphony Space
